snippet: Seeking to reassure manufacturers on supplies of heavy rare earths, Molycorp is to announce its rediscovery of a forgotten ore deposit in Southern California.
lead_paragraph: Seeking to reassure manufacturers on supplies of heavy rare earths, Molycorp is to announce its rediscovery of a forgotten ore deposit in Southern California.

headline.main: Molycorp Set to Announce a Rare Earth Rediscovery
headline.print_headline: Molycorp Set to Announce A Rare Earth Rediscovery
headline.seo: Molycorp to Announce Rare Earth Deposit at California Site
